description: This file declares the Response class within the WebSockets::JsonRpc namespace, which extends a JSONRPC message class and provides methods related to JSON-RPC response handling, such as retrieving the response ID, checking if the response indicates success or error, and extracting result or error objects.

classes.name: Response
classes.description: Represents a JSON-RPC response message, providing methods to access response details such as ID, result, and error information.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID associated with this response.

methods.name: isResult
methods.description: Checks if this response contains a successful result.

methods.name: getResult
methods.description: Retrieves the result object from the response if available.

methods.name: isError
methods.description: Checks if this response indicates an error.

methods.name: getError
methods.description: Retrieves the error object from the response if available.

methods.name: isValid
methods.description: Validates whether the response message is well-formed and contains expected data.
